350mb? what the shit? How the hell did you get it to compress to such a size?

Either this is fake(and gay) or you found a new way of compressing files that is up to 3x more efficient than zipping and archiving.

Personally I think it's the earlier option, nevertheless I'll download anyway, always keen to check out someones RAT or Trojan.
